title: Collaborative Tool Design for Self-Reflection in Maker Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational maker activity experience and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Applies collaborative design and UX design principles to develop self-reflection tools in smartphone-centric, technology-constrained environments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze problems arising during maker projects and derive reflective questions.
Effectively communicate with multidisciplinary team members to refine prototypes through collaborative design phases.
Design and evaluate a self-reflection tool interface usable in smartphone environments based on UX design principles.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
